articles.title: These Gen Zers just raised $11.75M to put Africa’s defense back in the hands of Africans
articles.excerpt: African defense company Terra comes out of stealth with a $11.75M round led by Joe Lonsdale’s 8VC.

articles.title: inDrive turns to ads and groceries to diversify revenue
articles.excerpt: Advertising on inDrive is being rolled out across its top 20 markets following mid-2025 tests.

articles.title: Motional puts AI at center of robotaxi reboot as it targets 2026 for driverless service
articles.excerpt: Motional says it will launch a driverless robotaxi service in Las Vegas before the end of 2026.

articles.title: Google co-founders may be leaving California
articles.excerpt: Sergey Brin and Larry Page appear to be pulling back from the state where they co-founded Google.

articles.title: Instagram says there’s been ‘no breach’ despite password reset requests
articles.excerpt: Instagram says that although some users received suspicious-looking password reset requests, it has not been breached.

articles.title: Google removes AI Overviews for certain medical queries
articles.excerpt: This follows an investigation by the Guardian that found Google AI Overviews offering misleading information in response to some health-related queries.

articles.title: Nuclear startups are back in vogue with small reactors, and big challenges
articles.excerpt: Small modular reactor startups are betting that mass manufacturing will help them bring costs down. But are they underestimating the challenge?

articles.title: Indonesia and Malaysia block Grok over non-consensual, sexualized deepfakes
articles.excerpt: Indonesian officials said Saturday that they are temporarily blocking access to xAI’s chatbot Grok.

articles.title: Google announces a new protocol to facilitate commerce using AI agents
articles.excerpt: Google said that merchants can now offer discounts to users directly in AI mode results

articles.title: Wing to expand drone delivery to another 150 Walmart stores
articles.excerpt: The partnership will grow Wing’s drone delivery service to more than 270 Walmart stores by 2027.
